seedGroups.name: Shattering
seedGroups.description: Shattering seeds can be tough to visually judge for ripeness. Use a *gentle* touch test to see if the seeds easily loosen.

species.description: Shattering. Seeds are football-shaped with parallel striations. Collect when they fall off easily with a light touch â€“ no force is necessary. Flowers are subtle and wind pollinated. Sow fresh seeds asap for best germination.
